rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Each digit outside the grid indicates that the digit is sandwiched between two odd digits in its adjacent cells in the corresponding direction. All such digits are given.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each digit outside the grid indicates that the digit is sandwiched between two odd digits in its adjacent cells in the corresponding direction. All such digits are given.
